name: Amp

attributes.name: Affiliation(s)
values: Imperial Navy77th Air WingSword SquadronBlade Squadron

content: Amp was a clone member of the 77th Air Wing's Sword Squadron. During the Battle of Kelrodo-Ai in the Western Reaches Operation of the Reconquest of the Rim, he flew under Blade Squadron with the call-sign Blade Two. Amp was one of the few survivors of the battle, as well as one of three members of the squadron directly responsible for the destruction of the hypermatter annihilator for the Citadel of Axes' shield generator .
